title: STET
body: I learned a new word today: <em>STET</em>.  Its direct meaning from Latin is "let it stand" - in proofreading terms it means "ignore my changes" - or in the words of <a href="http://pod-six.net/stimutacs.shtml">Sealab 2021's Captain Murphy</a>: "Shut up mailboxhead. It's cupcake time."
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-04-28
